thread.title: Here are 20 of the red carpet looks from the BAFTAs that we can’t stop gushing over
thread.title_full: Here are 20 of the red carpet looks from the BAFTAs that we can’t stop gushing over

author: Bronwyn Isaac
title: Here are 20 of the red carpet looks from the BAFTAs that we can’t stop gushing over
text:
Here are 20 of the red carpet looks from the BAFTAs that we can’t stop gushing over Besides marking a day of rest and sleeping in, Sunday night marked the 70th annual British Academy Film Awards which featured some of the top-earning actors of this past year, clamoring to take home the awards. As with all awards shows, we were just as transfixed by the red carpet looks as the BAFTA awards show itself .
Whether it was Dev Patel looking like a smug handsome vision (what’s new), or Millie Mackintosh serving up spring colors with conviction, there were many looks to choose from this year.
So, in an attempt to narrow it down, here are 20 of our favorite red carpet looks from the 2017 BAFTAs. 1. Sophie Turner Samir Hussein / Getty Images 
Her skirt looks like it was made out of outer space.
2. Daisy Ridley Samir Hussein / Getty Images 
She somehow pulled off patchwork on the red carpet.
3. Anya Taylor Joy Samir Hussein / Getty Images 
IS THAT A DRAGON ON HER DRESS? This is bold.
4. Naomie Harris Karwai Tang / Getty Images 
Those flowers, though.
5. Isabelle Huppert Barcroft / Getty Images 
This floor-length buttoned white dress is prime crisp.
6. Michelle Williams Brett Cove / Getty Images 
Her glittery graphic dress just further proves this was the year of prints at BAFTA.
7. Ava West Terry Scott / Getty Images 
It looks like she’s wearing melted rose water from outer space.
8. Edith Bowman David Bennett / Getty Images 
We’re not even sure where to look.
9. Penélope Cruz Richard Kendal / Getty Images 
She looks like the sun.
10. Nicole Kidman Richard Kendal / Getty Images Her necklace takes the cake.

11. Viola Davis Kendal Davis / Getty Images 
A glowing beauty in blue.
12. Dev Patel Richard Kendal / Getty Images 
His suit looks extra shiny.
13. Pedro Almodóvar Richard Kendal / Getty Images 
This man knows his scarves.
15. Taylor Hill Richard Kendal / Getty Images 
She looks ready to propose to the red carpet.
16. Emily Blunt Richard Kendal / Getty Images 
Yes.
17. Millie Mackintosh Richard Kendal / Getty Images 
We support anyone who can pull off this bold a shade of yellow.
18. J.K. Rowling Karwai Tang / Getty Images The shoes top it off.
19. Emma Stone Karwai Tang / Getty Images We love the pants underneath.
20. Ella Purnell David Bennett / Getty Images This shade of blue is so lovely.
We’re hoping that next year brings even more notable looks.
